title: High dose of flu vaccine boosts immune response in elderly
author: Calisha Myers
description: High dose of flu vaccine boosts immune response in elderly October 26, 2008 Giving people age 65 and older a dose four times larger than the standard flu vaccine boosts the amount of antibodies in | High dose of flu vaccine boosts immune response in elderly October 26, 2008 Giving people age 65 and older a dose four times larger than the standard flu vaccine boosts the amount of antibodies in
